# Sumit Santhosh Nair - Portfolio

> Full Stack Developer & Videographer based in Bengaluru, India

## About

I'm Sumit Santhosh Nair, an Engineering student at PES University focused on building scalable web applications and exploring multi-modal AI systems. I work as Head of Web Development at GronIT and have experience as a Teaching Assistant and Subject Matter Expert.

## Skills

- **Frontend**: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- **Backend**: Node.js, NestJS, PostgreSQL, tRPC, Drizzle ORM
- **Mobile**: Flutter, Dart
- **AI/ML**: Python, PyTorch, Reinforcement Learning, PPO
- **Tools**: Git, Docker, AWS, Vercel

## Projects

### Papertrail
A full-stack, multi-user blogging platform with markdown editor, category management, OAuth authentication, and dark mode. Features tRPC for type-safe APIs and Drizzle ORM.
- Tech: Next.js 15, tRPC, PostgreSQL, Drizzle ORM, TypeScript
- Live: https://papertrail-chi.vercel.app/
- GitHub: https://github.com/sumit-s-nair/papertrail

### Terrain-Aware Path Recommendation
An RL-based pathfinding system using PyBullet physics simulation. Trains agents to discover optimal hiking routes with realistic terrain friction and energy models.
- Tech: Python, PyBullet, PPO, Reinforcement Learning
- GitHub: https://github.com/sumit-s-nair/terrain-aware-path-recommendation

### Trailo
A motorcycle group riding and real-time tracking app. Features live location sharing, group management, trail discovery, and SOS safety features for adventurers.
- Tech: Flutter, NestJS, Real-time, Maps API, WebSocket
- Live: https://ridetrailo.com/

## Experience

- **Full Stack Developer Intern** at Kapybara (Dec 2025 - Jan 2026)
- **Head of Web Development** at GronIT (May 2025 - Present)
- **Subject Matter Expert (SME)** at PESU.io (Aug 2025 - Dec 2025)
- **Teaching Assistant** at PES University (Aug 2025 - Dec 2025)
- **Research Intern** at RAPID (Jun 2025 - Jul 2025)
- **Core Developer** at Nexus & GronIT (Oct 2024 - May 2025)
